content: {"name": "The Salvation Army National Capital Area Command - Washington DC Emergency Assistance", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Reached them by messenger , they asked for email address. i sent them sam mail address..\n", "email": "", "url": "http://salvationarmynca.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3101 Martin Luther King Junior Avenue Southeast (Wards 5-8)", "address_2": null, "city": "Southeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20032", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.843856, "longitude": -76.9992035}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 678-9770", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No food distribution - marked unavailable"}]}
